summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4715 for the improvement of Harbor Avenue Southwest, from Bronson Way to southerly line of Lot 51, Block 71 of 3rd Plat of the West Seattle Land and Improvement Company; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54561, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
